decisions.name: Check_Skip_Component_Issue_Non_Serial
decisions.label: Check Skip Component Issue - Non Serial

formulas.description: To see if Apex action returns at least one pohdr id
formulas.name: idsReturned

fields.name: Component_Issue_SYDATA_Result
fields.fieldText:
SYDATA: {!GET_SYDATA.Name}

Status: {!GET_SYDATA.rstk__sydata_process__c}

Qty Issued: {!Issued_Qty_Text}


{!GET_SYDATA.rstk__sydata_message__c}



Click next to issue another component.

fields.name: Component_Info
fields.fieldText:
Component Item: {!PO_Component_Demands.rstk__podmd_compitem__r.Name}

Qty Required: {!POCompQtyReq}

Qty Issued: {!POCompQtyIssued}

Qty Remaining: {!POCompQtyRemaining}

Lot Tracked: {!Lot_Tracked_Comp}

Serial Tracked: {!Serial_Tracked_Comp}

value.stringValue: rstk__iclocitem_div__c = '{!PO_Component_Demands.rstk__podmd_div__c}' AND rstk__iclocitem_site__c = '{!PO_Component_Demands.rstk__podmd_invsite__c}' AND rstk__iclocitem_proj__c = '{!PO_Component_Demands.rstk__podmd_issproj__c}' AND rstk__iclocitem_locqty__c > 0 AND rstk__iclocitem_availind__c = true AND rstk__iclocitem_icitemsrl__c = NULL AND rstk__iclocitem_iccontainer__c = NULL

fields.name: Loc_Not_Selected_Error
fields.fieldText: Please select an inventory location to issue from

fields.name: Invalid_Quantity_Error
fields.fieldText: Please enter a valid quantity to issue.

value.stringValue: Id IN ({!POHeaderIds}) and rstk__pohdr_ordsts__c IN ('5-Vendor Notified','7-Line Item Received','8-All Line Items Received')
